resources.string: since the last coffee brewing incident
How many incident-free days there has been?
Posting to Slack that %s didn\'t know how to make coffee.\n\nIs this correct?
Who is guilty of this coffee incident?
New MoccaMaster certified person announced successfully on Slack!
Couldn\'t post to Slack about new MoccaMaster graduate for some reason. :(
_%1$s_ didn\'t know how to make coffee.\n%2$s has failed to make coffee *%3$d* times.\nTotal number of *%4$d* incident free days were had.
Click on a correct person below.
*%1$s* just had a coffee brewing accident, and reseted the counter which was at *%2$d* days.\nThis is their %3$s coffee brewing accident.
*%1$s* is the leading MoccaMaster with a score of *%2$d* accidents.
Congratulations to *%1$s* for their first MoccaMaster Certificate! :clap::clap:\n%2$d accident-free days were had.
Touch the coffee pan above! NOW!
Are you sure you want to cancel current coffee brewing timer?
Are you sure you don\'t want to inform others about freshly brewed coffee?
Slack channel name for announcing when new coffee is ready.
No Slack channel name set for coffee announcements, set it in the preferences.
